args.subject: Invoice for Wireless Mouse Purchase
args.body:
Hi Alice,

I've successfully purchased the TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse for you. The total amount paid was $162.00. Please find the invoice in the attached email.

Best regards,
Emma Johnson

messages.content:
I have successfully repurchased the **TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse** for Alice using your available discount. The total amount paid was **$162.00**. 

An email has been sent to **alice.miller@gmail.com** with the invoice details. If you need anything else, feel free to ask!
